summary: Completed comprehensive testing of updated podcast journal system with project type selection (podcast vs vlog) and English interface. All requested features working correctly including group creation with project type selection, project type display on group cards and teacher dashboard, English interface, and full 5-day workflow functionality.

minor_fixes_applied.issue: API error messages were in Spanish instead of English
minor_fixes_applied.fix_applied: Updated all error messages to English in server.py

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint
Group creation with podcast project type
Group creation with vlog project type
Default project type (podcast) when not specified
Duplicate group name prevention
Get all groups with project types
Get specific group by ID
Update day data for all 5 days
Teacher login with correct/incorrect password
Group deletion
Frontend landing page load with English interface
Project type selection UI (podcast/vlog buttons)
Group creation modal and form with project types
Group creation with vlog project type (E2E)
Project page navigation with vlog icon display
5-day workflow navigation and form functionality
Data persistence and saving
Teacher dashboard authentication
Teacher dashboard group list with project type icons
Teacher dashboard group details showing project type labels
Complete project workflow (Days 1-5) with English interface
success_percentage: Backend: 94% (15/16 tests passed - 1 expected duplicate test failure), Frontend: 100% (all workflows tested successfully)
